long_description: The unique keylock nose prevents this carabiner from snagging on pro--it's clean and easy to clip! Dual-trac gate and keylock nose present a narrow profile that slips effortlessly into pro. Features a strong 25-kN strength rating with wide rope-bearing surface to spread the load. Simple screwgate lock with an easy-to-twist knurled finish, no exposed threads to cross. Functional shape is easy to hold; deep basket accepts loads of slings and runners.
short_description: The unique keylock nose prevents this carabiner from snagging on pro--it's clean and easy to clip!
